itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 18, 2013
teaser: A new reason to call JPMorgan a power player. The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission reportedly has evidence JPMorgan used 'manipulative schemes' to make big money off losing power plants. On the subject electricity, do we have enough electricity to run all this air conditioning? A stand off at the border between China and India. And Native Americans see sequester cuts to mental health services.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 18, 2013
byline: Bruce Johnson, Jeff Tyler, Sarah McCammon, Laurel Morales, Rahul Tandon, Chris Farrell, Queena Kim and David Brancaccio
description: A new reason to call JPMorgan a power player. The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission reportedly has evidence JPMorgan used 'manipulative schemes' to make big money off losing power plants. On the subject electricity, do we have enough electricity to run all this air conditioning? A stand off at the border between China and India. And Native Americans see sequester cuts to mental health services.
